context:
: 17
name: Summit Soft Loveseat
description: Our upholstered loveseat sofa is designed for smaller spaces – and years of enjoyment. Specs: Dimensions: 38"H x 61"W x 36"D. Weight: 115 lb. 

Why We Love It: We worked closely with expert upholstery craftsmen in North Carolina to bring you this sturdy classic-styled loveseat at a comfortable price. Our well-designed Pine Point Upholstered Collection features soft yet durable fabric in an enduring traditional style to suit any space. 

Fabric & Care: 100% polyester fabric. Spot clean. 

Construction: Kiln dried hardwood and manufactured wood. Heavy-gauge steel springs provide extra support. High-density foam and soft polyester fiberfill. 

Additional Features: Comes fully upholstered in a choice of colors for timeless appeal. Designed with plush cushioning in a versatile classic style. USA, fabric imported. 

Questions? Please contact our customer service team for more information.
query: What are the dimensions and weight of the Summit Soft Loveseat, and what materials are used in its construction?
ground_truths: The Summit Soft Loveseat has dimensions of 38 inches in height, 61 inches in width, and 36 inches in depth, and it weighs 115 pounds. Its construction includes kiln-dried hardwood and manufactured wood, with heavy-gauge steel springs for extra support. The upholstery is made of 100% polyester fabric, and the cushioning consists of high-density foam and soft polyester fiberfill.
answer: The dimensions of the Summit Soft Loveseat are 38"H x 61"W x 36"D and it weighs 115 lb. It is constructed with kiln dried hardwood, manufactured wood, heavy-gauge steel springs, high-density foam, and soft polyester fiberfill.

context:
: 427
name: Athletic Luxe Fleece Pullover, Quarter-Zip
description: Made from recycled fleece, this quarter-zip fleece jacket is softer than ever. Packed with performance features, it wicks moisture, dries quickly and is wonderfully breathable. Brushed on both sides for comfort you can count on all day long.

Size & Fit
Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body.
Falls at hip.

Why We Love It
An amazing fleece at an amazing price. Made completely from plastic bottles (approximately 15 17 oz. bottles for each jacket), it's unbelievably soft and truly gentle to our planet. Perfect whether you're walking (even jogging), heading out on everyday trips or relaxing at home.

Fabric & Care
100% recycled polyester fleece.
Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
Iconic Katahdin logo at bottom left.
Imported.
query: What are the key features and benefits of the Athletic Luxe Fleece Pullover, Quarter-Zip, as described in the document?
ground_truths: The Athletic Luxe Fleece Pullover, Quarter-Zip is made from 100% recycled polyester fleece, which is softer and more comfortable due to being brushed on both sides. It is designed to wick moisture, dry quickly, and provide breathability. The product is slightly fitted, falling at the hip, and is made from approximately 15-17 oz. plastic bottles, making it an environmentally friendly choice. It is ideal for various activities such as walking, jogging, everyday outings, or relaxing at home. The fleece is machine washable and dryable, and it features the iconic Katahdin logo at the bottom left.
answer: The Athletic Luxe Fleece Pullover, Quarter-Zip is made from recycled fleece, making it soft and gentle on the planet. It also has performance features such as moisture-wicking and quick-drying capabilities, as well as being breathable. The jacket is brushed on both sides for added comfort and has a slightly fitted shape that falls at the hip. It is also an affordable option and perfect for various activities.

context:
: 171
name: Signature Cotton Seaman Tunic Sweater, Colorblock
description: A new twist on a nautical tradition, our fisherman tunic sweater features a distinctive colorblock pattern in soft cotton yarns. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body. Falls at low hip. 

Why We Love It: The original fisherman’s sweaters of the Aran Islands were knit with designs that told stories of a rich coastal heritage. From good luck to a plentiful catch, special sentiments were represented in each and every stitch. We’ve recreated those same authentic cable patterns in an updated silhouette, beautifully stitched in a longer tunic length, perfect for pairing with leggings and skinny jeans. 

Fabric & Care: 100% cotton in a versatile three-season weight. Machine wash, dry flat. 

Additional Features: Rounded hem with antiqued brass zippers at each side. Imported. 

Questions? Please reach out to our customer service team for any questions or concerns.
query: What are the key features and benefits of the Signature Cotton Seaman Tunic Sweater, and how does its design connect to its historical roots?
ground_truths: The Signature Cotton Seaman Tunic Sweater features a distinctive colorblock pattern made from soft cotton yarns, offering a slightly fitted silhouette that softly shapes the body and falls at the low hip. It is designed with a longer tunic length, making it ideal for pairing with leggings and skinny jeans. The sweater pays homage to the original fisherman’s sweaters from the Aran Islands, which were knit with designs that represented stories and sentiments from coastal heritage, such as good luck and a plentiful catch. The sweater incorporates authentic cable patterns from these traditional designs. It is made of 100% cotton in a versatile three-season weight and is easy to care for, as it can be machine washed and dried flat. Additional features include a rounded hem and antiqued brass zippers at each side, enhancing its style and functionality.
answer: The key features of the Signature Cotton Seaman Tunic Sweater include its soft cotton yarns, slightly fitted silhouette, and longer tunic length. The design of the sweater is inspired by the original fisherman's sweaters of the Aran Islands, which were knit with designs that represented special sentiments and stories of a rich coastal heritage. The updated silhouette and cable patterns pay homage to this historical connection while also providing a modern and versatile style.

context:
: 341
name: TrailGuard Waterproof Gore-Tex Jacket
description: A waterproof, breathable and durable Gore-Tex jacket, updated with softer fabric and superior ventilation. Size & Fit: Traditional Fit. Best with midweight layer. Falls at hip.

Fabric & Care: Shell: 100% nylon plain weave, Gore-Tex laminate, DWR. Additional Features: Updated features include new core vents and three-way adjustable hood construction. Double-ripstop weave is twice as abrasion resistant. Stows in its own pocket. Imported.

Serious waterproof protection from the elements. Highly breathable; allows moisture vapor to escape. The durability you expect from Gore-Tex fabrics.
query: What are the key features and specifications of the TrailGuard Waterproof Gore-Tex Jacket, including fabric composition, fit, and additional features?
ground_truths: The TrailGuard Waterproof Gore-Tex Jacket is designed to be waterproof, breathable, and durable, featuring a traditional fit that is best worn with a midweight layer and falls at the hip. The fabric composition includes a shell made of 100% nylon plain weave with a Gore-Tex laminate and a durable water repellent (DWR) finish. Notable additional features include new core vents for ventilation and a three-way adjustable hood construction. The jacket is made from a double-ripstop weave, which makes it twice as abrasion resistant, and it can stow in its own pocket. It provides serious waterproof protection against the elements while allowing moisture vapor to escape, ensuring high breathability and durability typical of Gore-Tex fabrics.
answer: The TrailGuard Waterproof Gore-Tex Jacket is made of 100% nylon plain weave with a Gore-Tex laminate and DWR finish. It has a Traditional Fit and falls at the hip. Additional features include core vents, a three-way adjustable hood, and a double-ripstop weave for extra durability. It also stows in its own pocket for convenience.

name: Polar Percolator, Six-Cup
description: Enjoy the simple pleasures of life with an ultradurable 6-cup percolator. Make fresh-brewed gourmet-quality coffee on all your camping trips. 

Specs
Capacity: 48 oz.
Weight: 1 lb. 2 oz.

Construction
Marine-grade stainless-steel construction.
PercView knob made of tough co-polyester.

Additional Features
Dishwasher safe.
Resists corrosion.
Heat-resistant silicone handle.
Imported.

Questions?
Contact us for more information.
query: What are the key specifications and features of the Polar Percolator, Six-Cup, as described in the document?
ground_truths: The Polar Percolator, Six-Cup has a capacity of 48 oz. and weighs 1 lb. 2 oz. It is constructed from marine-grade stainless steel and features a PercView knob made of tough co-polyester. Additional features include being dishwasher safe, corrosion-resistant, and equipped with a heat-resistant silicone handle. The product is also imported.
answer: The key specifications and features of the Polar Percolator, Six-Cup are its capacity of 48 oz., weight of 1 lb. 2 oz., marine-grade stainless steel construction, PercView knob made of tough co-polyester, dishwasher safe, corrosion-resistant, heat-resistant silicone handle, and imported.
